description:
The Law Offices of Jennifer S. Carroll, P.A. is dedicated to assisting those who need experienced representation in state and federal appeals. The firm also assists with pretrial issues, post-trial proceedings and trial proceedings involving complex legal matters.

The firm handles these types of cases:

  • Commercial disputes
  • Business Law
  • Torts and Insurance
  • Wrongful Death
  • Coverage Issues
  • Health Care
  • Class Actions
  • FDUTPA
  • Probate/estate/trust matters
  • Will Contests
  • Guardianship Law
  • Libel/First Amendment law
  • Complex family law cases
  • Administrative Appeals
  • Constitutional Law
  • Post Judgment Proceedings

The Law Offices of Jennifer S. Carroll, P.A. looks at cases with a long-term perspective, identifying potential issues and their post-trial ramifications.The firm offers trial support and consultation services to companies, law firms, and individuals. This includes motion preparation, research, and analysis.

If you would like to discuss your appeal or consider the legal options available to you regarding your civil case, you may schedule an appointment. Please call or send an email.
